author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...PILAR EXPECTED TO BRING HEAVY RAINS AND FLOODING OVER PORTIONS  OF CENTRAL AMERICA DURING THE NEXT COUPLE OF DAYS...
summary:
...PILAR EXPECTED TO BRING HEAVY RAINS AND FLOODING OVER PORTIONS  OF CENTRAL AMERICA DURING THE NEXT COUPLE OF DAYS...
 As of 10:00 PM CDT Mon Oct 30
 the center of Pilar was located near 11.3, -90.9
 with movement ENE at 5 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1000 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Pilar (EP4/EP192023)
